remarks: The integral of a piecewise continuous periodic function ` F ` is unchanged if the domain is shifted by any value ` X ` .  This lemma generalizes ~ fourierdlem92 where the integral was shifted by the exact period (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
